subject: ISME
name: Project Mgmt
info: Broad areas in project management/leadership. Emphasizes practical understanding of business/engineering project management. Project planning, scheduling, controlling. Budgeting, staffing, task/cost control. Communicating with, motivating, leading, managing conflict.prereq: Open to general grad students but with instr consent

subject: ISME
name: Construction Estimating
info: Methods for quantity take-offs. Identification of resources for price/availability information.prereq: ISE grad student

subject: ISME
name: Comp Appl II
info: Application features in  Excel, Visual Basic, and Web Authoring. Data reduction, data presentation, interactive Web calculations. Student projects.prereq: ISE grad student

subject: ISME
name: ISE Management
info: Managing public works infrastructure. Case studies of decision making in environment of conflicting interests.prereq: Open to advanced master's students

subject: ISME
name: Computer Applications/ISE
fullname: Computer Applications in Infrastructure Systems Engineering
info: Advanced application of computer tools/methods in infrastructure engineering problems. Spreadsheet Visual Basic programming, HTML, JAVA script.prereq: ISE grad student

subject: ISME
name: Pavement Mgmt/Maint/Rehab
info: Concepts in network/project level pavement management for flexible/rigid pavements. Pavement distress identification/quantification. Functional/structural evaluation. Identification of appropriate maintenance activities. Selection/design of rehabilitation alternatives.prereq: ISE grad student

subject: ISME
name: Pavmnt Mgmt & Rehab
info: Concepts in network/project-level pavement management for flexible/rigid pavements. Pavement distress identification/quantification. Functional/structural evaluation. Identification of appropriate preventative/reactive maintenance activities. Selection/design of rehabilitation alternatives.prereq: ISE grad student

subject: ISME
name: Traffic Eng Mgmt
info: Identification and effective use of traffic control devices. Automated method of characterizing/assessing traffic flow. Evaluation/improvement of geometric features.prereq: ISE student

subject: ISME
name: BridgeMgmtMaint&Rehab
info: Structural/functional evaluation of steel, concrete, and timber bridges.  Distress identification. Modes of failure, including fatigue, corrosion, and foundation erosion (scour). Preventative/reactive maintenance techniques. Rehabilitation design/construction.prereq: ISE grad student

subject: ISME
name: Critical Infrast Secur & Prot
info: Security challenges of protecting critical infrastructure, facilities, and built environment. Security, agility, and robustness/survivability of large-scale critical infrastructure that face new threats and unanticipated conditions. Systems risk analysis, engineering, economics, and public policy approaches to infrastructure security. Design/management of complex civil infrastructure systems.prereq: ISE grad student or instr consent

subject: ISME
name: Water Dist Sys
info: Components/design of water distribution systems. Methods of evaluation/management. Maintenance/rehabilitation techniques.prereq: ISE grad student

subject: ISME
name: Storm Water Mgmt
info: Components/design of storm water collection systems. Methods of evaluation/management. Maintenance/rehabilitation techniques.prereq: ISE grad student

subject: ISME
name: Water Treat Syst
info: Components/design of water treatment systems. Evaluation/management methods. Maintenance/rehabilitation techniques.prereq: ISE student

subject: ISME
name: Public Interactions
info: Techniques for effective public communication. How to run public hearing. Resources for publishing public notices. Sequence course in three parts.prereq: Advanced grad student or open to general grad students with instr consent

subject: ISME
name: GIS
info: Introduction to geographic Information Systems (GIS) for infrastructure.  GIS application domains, data models/sources, analysis methods, and output techniques. Lectures, readings, hands-on experience with GIS software.prereq: ISE student

subject: ISME
name: Fin Mgmt in Pulic Org
info: Design, installation, and use of accounting/control systems in public organizations. Public accounting standards/practices, financial administration, financial reporting, debt management, budgeting, and contract/procurement management systems. Lecture, discussion, case analysis.prereq: ISE student

subject: ISME
name: Const Law & Ethcs
info: Ethical framework for responsible management of public works projects. Moral leadership, trust in public/private organizations, quality control.prereq: ISE student

subject: ISME
name: Capstone Project
info: Integrates knowledge from courses in Master's program with job experience. Students prepare proposal, conduct project, and report results in written and oral form. Project involves aspect of design, management, or operation of some feature of infrastructure.prereq: ISE student

subject: ISME
name: FTE: Master's
info: FTE: Master'sPrereq Master's student, adviser approval, DGS approval.
